description: a(0) = 0; for n > 0, if n appears in the sequence then a(n) = a(n-1) - sum of indexes where n appeared if that is nonnegative and not already in the sequence, otherwise a(n) = a(n-1) + sum of indexes. Otherwise a(n) = a(n-1) - n if nonnegative and not already in the sequence, otherwise a(n) = a(n-1) + n.
